ec_simpleModeDescription.en: Select destination ad group(s) for your {entityType}s in the tree view

ec_advancedModeDescription.en: Input the ad group name, campaign name and publisher name for each {entityType} in TSV format

ec_unexpectedErrorMessage.en: We had a problem with your request, please try again later

ec_thresholdErrorMessage.en: You are about to create more than {threshold} {entityType}, please reduce the number of Ad Groups selected or use the Bulksheet import

ec_keywordCreationDescription.en: Add keywords to one or multiple ad groups

ec_keywordCreationSimpleTip1.en: Simple Mode is Excel-friendly. Simply COPY/PASTE

ec_keywordCreationSimpleTip2.en: Keyword Text field accepts BROAD, +MODIFIED +BROAD, "PHRASE" or [EXACT]

ec_keywordCreationSimpleTip3.en: Single Keyword per line, fields are tab separated

ec_keywordCreationSimpleTip4.en: Only the Keyword Text field is mandatory

ec_keywordCreationSimpleTip5.en: Use Advanced Mode to create keywords across publishers

ec_keywordCreationAdvancedTip1.en: Advanced Mode is Excel-centric. Simply COPY/PASTE. Max. 1000 lines

ec_keywordCreationAdvancedTip2.en: Keyword Text field accepts BROAD, +MODIFIED +BROAD, "PHRASE" or [EXACT]

ec_keywordCreationAdvancedTip3.en: In Advanced Mode Publisher Name, Campaign Name, AdGroup Name and Keyword Text fields are mandatory

ec_keywordConfirmRemove.en: Do you wish to remove this keyword?

ec_textAdCreationDescription.en: Add text ads to one or multiple ad groups

ec_textAdCreationSimpleTip1.en: Copy/paste from a Word or Excel file

ec_textAdCreationSimpleTip2.en: Use the simple mode if you want to add a list of text ads to multiple ad groups

ec_textAdCreationAdvancedTip1.en: Copy/paste from a Word or Excel file

ec_textAdCreationAdvancedTip2.en: Use the simple mode if you want to add a list of text ads to multiple ad groups

ec_dynamicSearchAdCreationDescription.en: Add dynamic search ads to one or multiple ad groups

ec_dynamicSearchAdCreationSimpleTip1.en: Copy/paste from a Word or Excel file

ec_dynamicSearchAdCreationSimpleTip2.en: Use the simple mode if you want to add a list of dynamic search ads to multiple ad groups

ec_dynamicSearchAdCreationAdvancedTip1.en: Copy/paste from a Word or Excel file

ec_dynamicSearchAdCreationAdvancedTip2.en: Use the simple mode if you want to add a list of  dynamic search ads to multiple ad groups

ec_mobileAppAdCreationTitle.en: Create new mobile app install ads

ec_mobileAppAdCreationDescription.en: Add mobile app install ads to one or multiple ad groups

ec_mobileAppAdCreationSimpleTip1.en: Copy/paste from a Word or Excel file

ec_mobileAppAdCreationSimpleTip2.en: Use the simple mode if you want to add a list of mobile app install ads to multiple ad groups

ec_mobileAppAdCreationAdvancedTip1.en: Copy/paste from a Word or Excel file

ec_mobileAppAdCreationAdvancedTip2.en: Use the simple mode if you want to add a list of mobile app install ads to multiple ad groups

ec_autoTargetCreationDescription.en: Add dynamic ad target to one or multiple ad groups (AdWords only)

ec_autoTargetExclusionCreationTitle.en: Create new dynamic ad target exclusion

ec_autoTargetExclusionCreationDescriptio.en: Add  dynamic ad target exclusions to one or multiple ad groups (AdWords only)

ec_textHeaderNotFoundErrorMessage.en: "{header}" is not included in the possible header names

ec_textHeaderOnlyErrorMessage.en: Please input text after the header line

ec_textParsingErrorMessage.en: "{value}" is not a valid {header} at line {lineNumber}

ec_selectParsingErrorMessage.en: "{value}" is not a valid {header} ({selectOptions}) at line {lineNumber}

ec_textValueOutOfBoundErrorAnnotationMes.en: "{value}" is not associated with any header

ec_textValueOutOfBoundErrorMessage.en: "{value}" is not associated with any header at line {lineNumber}

ec_textParentNameConflictErrorMessage.en: You cannot include parent names when in simple mode

ec_treeEmptySelectionErrorMessage.en: You need to check one or multiple items in the tree view before saving

ec_gridUniqueAdUrl.en: Please enter only one url: Dest. URL OR Final URL

ec_gridNoAccessError.en: You don't have access to this {field}

ec_gridPublisherNotSupported.en: This publisher is not yet supported

ec_invalidContainerStatusError.en: Cannot add item to a deleted or ended {field}

ec_requiredOrContentMaxCpc.en: {field} or Content Max CPC is required

ec_requiredOrDefaultMaxCpc.en: {field} or Default Max CPC is required

ec_nonCpcCampaignUnsupported.en: You are trying to create an adgroup on a campaign with a bidding strategy that is not supported

ec_startDateCannotBePast.en: Start cannot be in the past

ec_startDateCannotBeAfterEndDate.en: Start date cannot be after end date

ec_endDateCannotBePast.en: End date cannot be in the past

ec_startDateEndDateMustBeDifferent.en: Start date and End date cannot be equal

ec_startDateTooFarInFuture.en: Please choose an earlier start date

ec_endDateTooFarInFuture.en: Please choose an earlier end date

ec_defaultMaxCpcTooLow.en: Default Max CPC must be at least (Bing Ads: 0.05, Adwords: 0.01)
ec_defaultMaxCpcTooLow.ja: Default Max CPC must be at least (Bing Ads: 0.05, Adwords: 0.01)

ec_contentMaxCpcTooLow.en: Content Max CPC must be at least 0.05

ec_notAvailableOnBudgetOptimizerCampaign.en: This field is not available on a budget optimizer campaign

ec_finalOrDestinationUrlMustBeDefined.en: For AdWords: Dest. URL or Final URL is required

ec_searchQueryAdvancedModeTooltip_1.en: Using Quick Add will add the selected Search Queries as new EXACT match Keywords or Negatives in the Ad Group where they triggered the click.

ec_searchQueryAdvancedModeTooltip_2.en: In Advanced Mode, you will have the opportunity to edit the keyword, match type, Ad Group and Campaign. For new keywords, you will also have the option of entering a Status, Max CPC and Destination URL.

ec_campaignsOrAdgroupsUnresolvedText.en: Items are being added to the following new campaigns and/or ad groups.

ec_campaignCreationDescription.en: Add new campaigns to one or multiple publishers

ec_adGroupCreationDescription.en: Add ad groups to one or multiple campaigns

ec_adGroupCreationEmptySelectionErrorMes.en: Please select campaigns in the tree before submitting.

ec_adGroupCreationSimpleModeDescription.en: Select destination campaign(s) for your ad groups in the tree

ec_adGroupCreationAdvancedModeDescriptio.en: Input the campaign name and publisher name for each ad group in TSV format

ec_adGroupCreationSimpleTip1.en: Simple Mode is Excel-friendly. Simply COPY/PASTE

ec_adGroupCreationSimpleTip2.en: The same Ad Group can be created at multiple publishers by selecting them in the treeview

ec_adGroupCreationSimpleTip3.en: Select Advanced Mode to mass create Ad Groups

ec_adGroupCreationAdvancedTip1.en: Advanced Mode is Excel-friendly. Simply COPY/PASTE

ec_adGroupCreationAdvancedTip2.en: You can mass-create Ad Groups by providing the proper Publisher + Campaign information

ec_adGroupCreationAdvancedTip3.en: The Campaigns in which you are creating the Ad Groups must exist.

ec_campaignAddedToQueue.en: Campaign successfully added to queue. You will be redirected to its settings.

ec_stringIsTooLong25.en: Text is too long. Max length is 25 characters.

ec_stringIsTooLong35.en: Text is too long. Max length is 35 characters.

ec_adTypeCannotBeAddedToMobileAppInstall.en: This Ad Type can not be added to a Mobile App Installs Campaign.

ec_mobileAppInstallAdsCanOnlyBeAddedToMo.en: Mobile App Install Ads can only be added to a Mobile App Installs Campaign.

ec_stringIsTooLong255.en: Text is too long. Max length is 255 characters.
ec_stringIsTooLong255.ja: Text is too long. Max length is 255 characters.

ec_invalidCharacterForName.en: Yahoo Japan Name cannot contain any of these characters ½, <, >, ¥, ®, ©, ™
ec_invalidCharacterForName.ja: Yahoo Japan Name cannot contain any of these characters ½, <, >, ¥, ®, ©, ™

ec_invalidCharacterForHeadLine.en: Yahoo Japan Headline cannot contain any of these characters: \, /, _, ”, “, $, %, &, ~, ½, <, >, ¥, ®, ©, ™
ec_invalidCharacterForHeadLine.ja: Yahoo Japan Headline cannot contain any of these characters: \, /, _, ”, “, $, %, &, ~, ½, <, >, ¥, ®, ©, ™

ec_invalidCharacterForDescription1.en: Yahoo Japan Description 1 cannot contain any of these characters: \, /, _, ”, “, $, %, &, ~, ½, <, >, ¥, ®, ©, ™
ec_invalidCharacterForDescription1.ja: Yahoo Japan Description 1 cannot contain any of these characters: \, /, _, ”, “, $, %, &, ~, ½, <, >, ¥, ®, ©, ™

ec_invalidCharacterForDescription2.en: Yahoo Japan Description 2 cannot contain any of these characters: \, /, _, ”, “, $, %, &, ~, ½, <, >, ¥, ®, ©, ™
ec_invalidCharacterForDescription2.ja: Yahoo Japan Description 2 cannot contain any of these characters: \, /, _, ”, “, $, %, &, ~, ½, <, >, ¥, ®, ©, ™

ec_stringIsTooLongYahooJapanDescription1.en: For Yahoo Japan: Description fields cannot exceed 19 characters.
ec_stringIsTooLongYahooJapanDescription1.ja: For Yahoo Japan: Description fields cannot exceed 19 characters.
